attributes.action: undertake construction of a Western Relief Motorway around the West Midlands Conurbation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this petition is to reduce the traffic congestion between junctions 8 and 11 of the M6 and at the intersection of the M6 and the M5 at Ray Hall. The proposal is the creation of a Western Orbital Road (Motorway) beginning at the intersection of the M5 and M42 and bypassing the west midlands conurbation to the west, rejoining the M6 at the intersection of the M6 Toll Motorway.
